JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse employees are sought for a company in Vejen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Warehouse employees are sought for a company in Vejen

 

We are currently looking for skilled warehouse employees for our partners in Vejen. The tasks are typically picking and packing, emptying containers and truck driving for those who have a truck certificate. We are therefore looking for quality-conscious employees who take pride in the work they do. For the right person, the temporary position can become a permanent employment.

Working hours can be on day shifts or evening shifts.

We offer:

  • Possibility of part-time or full-time temporary positions with the possibility of permanent employment
  • Salary by agreement
  • A good workplace

 

We expect you: 

  • Is meeting stable
  • Speaks Danish or English
  • Is ready for a physical job
  • Criminal record

Would you like to be part of a highly professional environment? Then do not hesitate to send us an application at www.bechpersonale.dk or horsens@bechpersonale.dk . If you have questions about the above job posting, you are always welcome to contact us by phone: 72 10 85 46.
